thread.title: Ed Sheeran pays Essex hockey club a surprise visit to watch his girlfriend play a match
thread.title_full: Ed Sheeran pays Essex hockey club a surprise visit to watch his girlfriend play a match

author: Jennifer Crothers
title: Ed Sheeran pays Essex hockey club a surprise visit to watch his girlfriend play a match
text:
Ed Sheeran pays Essex hockey club a surprise visit to watch his girlfriend play a match The singer travelled to Chelmsford to see hockey star Cherry Seaborn and posed for selfies with fans Share Ed Sheeran went to Chelmsford and watched some hockey (Photo: Chelmsford Hockey Club) Share Get   
Ed Sheeran has yet again proved he’s one of the most normal celebrities around - after spending his Saturday afternoon cheering on his girlfriend from the sidelines at a hockey match in Essex. 
The singer was watching from the sidelines at Chelmsford Hockey Club as girlfriend and superstar hockey player Cherry Seaborn was playing a match as part of the visiting Wimbledon Hockey Club. 
And instead of being all mardy about being spotted, Ed happily posed for selfies with fans and was generally being just a nice normal bloke. Ed posed for selfies with his sporty fans (Photo: Chelmsford Hockey Club) Ed was watching his girlfriend Cherry play (Photo: Chelmsford Hockey Club) 
"Thank you to Ed Sheeran for making it a special day at Chelmer Park for a lot of our younger players,” read a tweet from Chelmsford Hockey Club’s account. “Thank you for making some older players happy too." 
A spokeswoman for Chelmsford Hockey Club said: "I don't believe it was a planned visit, but I think he attended to watch his girlfriend who played for the opposition team, Wimbledon, this afternoon." 
Ed must've been a good omen - as Wimbledon won 5-0. A jolly-looking Ed with Cherry after a party in 2015 (Photo: Splash) From red carpets to green astro turf, Ed's pretty versatile (Photo: PA) Read More Ed Sheeran to headline Teenage Cancer Trust concert at London's Royal Albert Hall next month 
Ed and his former school friend Cherry have dated since the middle of 2015, and the pair spent most of 2016 travelling the world together as Ed enjoyed a year off from the music business. 
Speaking on BBC Radio 2, he shared: "I'm actually the happiest I've been and it's because I had a year to spend with someone. I've always started relationships then gone off on tour. 
"I spent every day for a year with this certain person, we kind of have a strong relationship now which is good. 
"I'm really secure now, we live together and we have cats, and I think when you have cats that's kind of it."
